column1: Senate Vote #2 1789-07-18T00:00:00 - TO AMEND THE ACT (1 STAT 28
column3: FOR ESTABLISH- ING AN EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT
column4: TO BE DENOMINATED THE DEPART- MENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS; SO AS TO STRIKE THE WORDS "BY THE PRESIDENT"
column5: IN THE SECTION DEALING WITH THE APPOINTMENT OF A CHIEF CLERK.
